about.title: About Us
about.description: Discover our journey, mission, and the passionate team behind your favorite online shopping destination.
about.heroDescription: Discover our journey, mission, and the passionate team behind your favorite online shopping destination.
about.storyText1: Launched in 2015, Exclusive is South Asia's premier online shopping marketplace with an active presence in Bangladesh. Supported by wide range of tailored marketing, data and service solutions, Exclusive has 10,500 sellers and 300 brands and serves 3 millions customers across the region.
about.storyText2: Exclusive has more than 1 Million products to offer, growing at a very fast. Exclusive offers a diverse assortment in categories ranging from consumer electronics to fashion, home & living, beauty, and more.
about.valuesDescription: Our core values guide every decision we make and every action we take.
about.missionDescription: To provide the best online shopping experience with quality products and exceptional customer service.
about.valuesDescription2: Integrity, innovation, customer focus, and continuous improvement drive everything we do.
about.visionDescription: To become the leading e-commerce platform trusted by millions of customers worldwide.
about.teamDescription: The passionate individuals behind our success story.
about.ctaDescription: Join millions of satisfied customers who trust us for their online shopping needs.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heroDescription: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.subject: Subject *
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...
contact.messageSentSuccess: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.contactDescription: Reach out to us through any of these channels.
contact.visitDescription: Come say hello at our office
contact.fastResponse: Fast response times - we typically respond within 2-4 hours during business hours
contact.expertSupport: Expert support team with deep knowledge of our products and services
contact.multipleChannels: Multiple contact channels to suit your preferred communication style
contact.ctaDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Our customer support team is here to help.

shippingTime.question: How long does shipping take?
shippingTime.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping is available for 1-2 business days.

returnPolicy.question: What's your return policy?
returnPolicy.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Some restrictions apply to electronics and personal care items.

internationalShipping.question: Do you ship internationally?
internationalShipping.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location.

orderTracking.question: How can I track my order?
orderTracking.answer: You'll receive a tracking number via email once your order ships. You can also track it in your account dashboard.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Find answers to common questions about shopping, shipping, returns, and more at Eco-Site.
faqs.heroDescription: Find answers to the most common questions about shopping, shipping, returns, and more. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.
faqs.ctaDescription: Our customer support team is here to help you with any questions or concerns you may have.

placeOrder.question: How do I place an order?
placeOrder.answer: Browse our products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You'll need to create an account or sign in, provide shipping and payment information, and confirm your order. You'll receive an order confirmation email once your order is placed.

modifyOrder.question: Can I modify or cancel my order after it's placed?
modifyOrder.answer: Orders can be modified or cancelled within 1 hour of placement, as long as they haven't been processed for shipping. Contact our customer service team immediately if you need to make changes to your order.

trackOrder.question: How can I track my order?
trackOrder.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'My Orders' section. Real-time tracking updates are available through our website.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our trusted payment partners.

shippingTime.question: How long does shipping take?
shippingTime.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available for an additional fee. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days depending on the destination.

freeShipping.question: Do you offer free shipping?
freeShipping.answer: Yes! We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $25. Orders under $25 have a flat shipping rate of $4.99. Express shipping is available for $9.99 regardless of order value.

internationalShipping.question: Do you ship internationally?
internationalShipping.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping costs and delivery times vary by location. You can check shipping rates and estimated delivery times during checkout.

lostPackage.question: What happens if my package is lost or damaged?
lostPackage.answer: If your package is lost or damaged during shipping, please contact our customer service team within 30 days of the expected delivery date. We'll work with the shipping carrier to resolve the issue and provide a replacement or refund.

returnPolicy.question: What's your return policy?
returnPolicy.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Items must be unused, in original packaging, and in the same condition as received. Some restrictions apply to electronics, personal care items, and sale items.

howToReturn.question: How do I return an item?
howToReturn.answer: Log into your account, go to 'My Orders', select the order containing the item you want to return, and click 'Return Item'. Print the return label, package the item securely, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location.

refundTime.question: How long does it take to process a refund?
refundTime.answer: Once we receive your return, we'll inspect the item and process your refund within 3-5 business days. Refunds are issued to your original payment method and may take 5-10 business days to appear on your statement.

returnShipping.question: Do I have to pay for return shipping?
returnShipping.answer: Returns due to our error (wrong item, damaged item) are free. Returns for other reasons may incur a return shipping fee of $5.99, which will be deducted from your refund amount.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top navigation, fill in your details (name, email, password), and verify your email address. You can also create an account during checkout.

resetPassword.question: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
resetPassword.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the sign-in page, enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link. The link expires in 24 hours for security.

security.question: Is my personal information secure?
security.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect your personal and payment information. We never store your credit card details and use secure payment processors for all transactions.

multipleAddresses.question: Can I save multiple shipping addresses?
multipleAddresses.answer: Yes, you can save multiple shipping addresses in your account. Go to 'My Account' > 'Addresses' to add, edit, or remove shipping addresses.

contactSupport.question: How can I contact customer service?
contactSupport.answer: You can reach us via email at support@eco-site.com, phone at +1 (555) 123-4567, or live chat on our website. Our customer service team is available Monday-Friday, 9 AM-6 PM EST.

supportInfo.question: What information should I provide when contacting support?
supportInfo.answer: Please include your order number (if applicable), email address, and a detailed description of your issue. Screenshots or photos can also be helpful for certain problems.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how we protect your privacy and handle your personal information at Eco-Site. Read our comprehensive privacy policy.
privacy.introductionText1: At Eco-Site, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or make purchases from our online store.
privacy.introductionText2: By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our website.
personalInfoItems: Name and contact information (email, phone number)
Payment information (processed securely through our payment partners)
usageInfoItems: Pages visited and time spent on our website
privacy.howWeUseText: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
howWeUseItems: Communicate with you about your account and orders
privacy.sharingText: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
sharingItems: Service Providers: With trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and processing payments
Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
Consent: With your explicit consent for specific purposes
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information:
privacy.securityNote: However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.rightsText: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rightsItems: Access: Request access to your personal information
Correction: Request correction of inaccurate information
Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
Portability: Request a copy of your data in a portable format
Complaints: Lodge a complaint with relevant authorities
privacy.rightsContact: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience:
cookiesItems: Essential Cookies: Required for website functionality
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand website usage
Marketing Cookies: Used for targeted advertising
Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences
privacy.cookiesControl: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
privacy.helpText: Have questions about our privacy practices?

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: Read our terms of use and conditions for using Eco-Site. Understand your rights and responsibilities as a user.
terms.agreementText1: These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern your use of the Eco-Site website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and all applicable laws and regulations.
terms.agreementText2: If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law.
terms.licenseText1: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on Eco-Site's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
terms.licenseText2: This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
licenseItems: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
Attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the website
Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
Transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server
terms.accountText1: To access certain features of our website, you may be required to create an account. You agree to:
accountItems: Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
Maintain and update your account information
Keep your password secure and confidential
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
terms.accountText2: We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms or for any other reason at our discretion.
terms.orderAcceptanceText: All orders are subject to acceptance and availability. We reserve the right to refuse any order for any reason.
terms.pricingText: All prices are subject to change without notice. Prices do not include applicable taxes, shipping, or handling fees.
terms.paymentText: Payment must be made at the time of order placement. We accept major credit cards and other payment methods as indicated on our website.
terms.orderConfirmationText: You will receive an order confirmation email once your order is successfully placed and payment is processed.
terms.shippingMethodsText: We offer various shipping options with different delivery times and costs. Shipping times are estimates and may vary.
terms.deliveryText: Risk of loss and title for items purchased pass to you upon delivery of the items to the carrier.
terms.internationalShippingText: International orders may be subject to additional customs duties, taxes, and fees that are the responsibility of the customer.
terms.returnPolicyText: Most items can be returned within 30 days of delivery for a full refund or exchange, subject to our return policy conditions.
returnConditionItems: Items must be unused and in original packaging
Some items may not be eligible for return
Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days
terms.ipText1: The content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, images, logos, and software, is the property of Eco-Site and is protected by copyright laws.
terms.ipText2: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works from any content on this website without our express written consent.
terms.websiteAvailabilityText: We strive to maintain website availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access. We may suspend or terminate access at any time.
terms.productInformationText: While we strive for accuracy, product descriptions, prices, and availability are subject to change without notice.
terms.limitationOfLiabilityText: In no event shall Eco-Site be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or services.
terms.governingLawText1: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Eco-Site operates.
terms.governingLawText2: Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of our website shall be resolved in the courts of competent jurisdiction in our operating jurisdiction.
terms.changesText1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.
terms.changesText2: Your continued use of our website after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.
terms.changesText3: We encourage you to review these Terms periodically for any updates.
terms.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us:
